name: Depth League
description:
Depth League is a semi-casual driving game focused on single-player action. The game has an added primary mechanic of slowing time while driving to avoid obstacles. In this game, the player enters an antigravity vehicle in which they will race through an enclosed airtight racetrack that is located in the depths of the ocean.Passing through these depths of the ocean, the racecourse will go through interesting underwater landscapes like kelp forests, and places so dark that the only light beyond the track comes from the glow of sea creatures’ bioluminescence.

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Shift: Slow Down Time

Space: Handbrake

ESC: Return to Main Menu

R: Insta-Restart
